description: This file defines a Python class 'GoogleBigQueryTools' that provides utility methods for interacting with Google BigQuery, including listing tables, describing tables, and running SQL queries. It is part of a larger project involving data tools and logging.

classes.name: GoogleBigQueryTools
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with Google BigQuery, including listing tables, describing tables, and executing SQL queries.

methods.name: list_tables
methods.description: Returns a string listing all table IDs in the specified dataset.

methods.name: describe_table
methods.description: Returns a JSON string describing the table schema and description for a given table ID.

methods.name: run_sql_query
methods.description: Executes a SQL query on BigQuery and returns the results as a JSON string.

methods.name: _run_sql
methods.description: Internal method that runs a SQL query and returns the results as a string.
